verses.name: Luke 24:38
verses.text: And he said unto them, Why are ye troubled? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts?

verses.name: Luke 24:39
verses.text: Behold my hands and my feet, that it is I myself: handle me, and see; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have.

verses.name: Luke 24:40
verses.text: And when he had thus spoken, he shewed them his hands and his feet.

verses.name: Luke 24:41
verses.text: And while they yet believed not for joy, and wondered, he said unto them, Have ye here any meat?

verses.name: Luke 24:42
verses.text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish, and of an honeycomb.
